about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, loud sounds, and lots of jumpscares.


Death lurks in the dark woods of Deathwoods. Up to 5 players must join forces to find supplies and escape a terrifying monster that reacts to your every sound. Can you escape this terrifying place before the sinister force catches up with you?

What is your challenge?

Deathwoods takes place in the haunted woods of Deathwoods, where you can find several different items that will allow you to get out of the woods and also help you defend yourself against a killer who decides to kill you and maybe even succeeds. Be careful though, the killer can hear your voice from the microphone, so you have to be quiet.

Can you do it?

  • Playability
    Deathwoods has simple controls for surviving in the cornfield yet everything will be explained to you.

  • Online co-op for 1-5 players
    You can play Deathwoods alone or together with your friends. Up to 5 of you can play together.

  • Repeatability
    The full version of Deathwoods offers many different maps and game modes. You'll never find yourself running out of things to do, thanks to random events you'll be scared forever.

  • Game Modes and Difficulty
    In addition to several Deathwoods maps, the full version also offers several game modes and difficulties.

  • Features in multiplayer mode
    Take advantage of voice chat that reacts to distance from others. Be careful though, the killer can hear you too and will come after you!

Multiplayer

In addition to the single player mode, Deathwoods also offers multiplayer for up to 5 players. In some situations, you'll have to work together to survive this nightmare and escape without getting killed by the monster.

name: DeathWoods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
